name: Quito Quest
description:
A downloadable game for Windows 10 64bit

Languages: English / Español

Quito Quest is a japanese inspired turn based RPG that combines that traiditional Ecuadorian card game of "Cuarenta" with turn based combat, taking place in the city of Quito during 3 different decades you'll control 3 different groups as they try to uncover a conspiracy that's affecting the city.

This is just the prologue of a game that will hopefully be fully developed some day, have fun!

Play time: Over 1 hour.

Developed with Unreal Engine 4
